name: MTLMutability
desc: The options that determine the mutability of a buffer's contents.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The default behavior, based on the buffer’s type.

items.name: case mutable
items.desc: An option that states that you can modify the buffer’s contents.

items.name: case immutable
items.desc: An option that states that you can’t modify the buffer’s contents.
